title: Day 8: Unscheduled Interruptions
description:
Elana Meyers Taylor was meant to bear the flag for Team USA. Instead, she spent the first days of these games in isolation following a positive COVID test for her, her husband and toddler. 

Elana’s situation allows Lauren Shehadi and On Her Turf Blog editor,  Alex Azzi,  to explore the added challenges that female Olympians face and how they do so with unbridled optimism for an increasingly equal sports landscape. 

Follow The Podium now on Apple Podcasts  to get automatic downloads. And tune into the networks of NBC to watch every moment of the 2022 Beijing Winter Olympic games.
author: tess.quinlan@nbcuni.com (NBC Sports)
